column4: right now I'm stuck using Windows and AOL but I've tried Ubuntu (hoary) before and liked it with one exception: The inablility to use anything except AOL
use breezy and there is something in repos that allows you to use alo
i dont remember what the packages are for or called but i remember seeing them
i remember what packages I need, it's just that Penggy is in Universe...
is their any way of getting the universe reop w/o needing a pre-existing net connection? AOL is my primary net connection
can you install the penggy deb file w/o needing the universe repo?
yeah download it but again need a net connection for it
never done this before but try to download it from another pc and burn it to disk see if you can use the disk to install it
